about_the_game:
Well, 2020 didn’t turn out the way anybody expected. We’d hoped to be able to bring Circuit Superstars to a range of events around the world – but it wasn’t to be. So, while we prepare the game for an Early Access release in the first part of 2021, we thought we’d make the event demo available for everybody to try.

This Demo was built specifically for 1080p demo machines, running mid-range gaming hardware. The full game will support many more resolutions, and feature significantly improved performance optimisations, as well alongside a bunch more content of course.

This is a slice of the game from much earlier in development, and once Early Access opens up you’ll notice quite a lot of progress from this build – but it gives you a sense of how the cars feel to drive. Which, frankly, is the most important thing. We’ll have more news and details on how 2021 will become the year you fell in love with Circuit Superstars, but for now – we hope you enjoy playing it as much as we’re enjoying making it. And, of course, don’t forget to join the and share your best lap times with us!
detailed_description:
Well, 2020 didn’t turn out the way anybody expected. We’d hoped to be able to bring Circuit Superstars to a range of events around the world – but it wasn’t to be. So, while we prepare the game for an Early Access release in the first part of 2021, we thought we’d make the event demo available for everybody to try.

This Demo was built specifically for 1080p demo machines, running mid-range gaming hardware. The full game will support many more resolutions, and feature significantly improved performance optimisations, as well alongside a bunch more content of course.

This is a slice of the game from much earlier in development, and once Early Access opens up you’ll notice quite a lot of progress from this build – but it gives you a sense of how the cars feel to drive. Which, frankly, is the most important thing. We’ll have more news and details on how 2021 will become the year you fell in love with Circuit Superstars, but for now – we hope you enjoy playing it as much as we’re enjoying making it. And, of course, don’t forget to join the and share your best lap times with us!

name: Circuit Superstars Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 Bit Only: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 9.0c compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Circuit Superstars offers a unique mix of top-down arcade accessibility with the authenticity of motorsport sims. Get ready to race, set the pace, and become a Circuit Superstar!
